or crypto currencies anything that

have to demonize it and of course with

and they've been saying you know
criminals use it it's for money

they've been caught laundering money how

now to put all of this in context that
means that's many times the roughly

meaning that the money-laundering

transformed the estonia banking system
into a giant
front for organized crime groups and

they were investigations that were

it's really cryptocurrency that's the

extortion you name it but when we look

actually what if the central banking

it's a barbarous relic you don't need it
it's not worth anything it's not real

they're used for laundering money or

actually mirror everything that they're

the plunge in permanent is the worst

and we're gonna see things start to

the middle-class America this is where

they're knocked out of the market they

those people who are looking to

Trump this whole entire time but the

to

countries are losing faith in the u.s.

actually Russia has accelerated its

they've been dumping Japan dumped quite

they have about 6.2 trillion worth of

most of it US institutions government

and the only place that can be picked up

destroy the global trade system and this

bringing it back to the

pretty soon the people are going to take

listen everyone thanks a lot for
